UNTDID5243Type.title: Rate or tariff class description code
UNTDID5243Type.description:
Code specifying an applicable rate or tariff class.

Applicable codes:
* 'A' - Senior person rate
* 'B' - Basic
* 'C' - Specific commodity rate
* 'D' - Teenager rate
* 'E' - Child rate
* 'F' - Adult rate
* 'G' - Export Subsidy Rate
* 'H' - Subsidy Rate
* 'K' - Rate per kilogram
* 'M' - Minimum charge rate
* 'N' - Normal rate
* 'Q' - Quantity rate
* 'R' - Class rate (Reduction on normal rate)
* 'S' - Class rate (Surcharge on normal rate)
